item.title: Help me with making monsters walk i forgot (-_-)
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Make the walk type 2 and for the range x2 and range y2 change how far you want him to walk from the original spawn point in each direction so say a npc spawns at 0000 and 0000 I want him to walk 5 spaces in all 4 directions I would type 0005 0005 as the walk type for x2 and y2â€¦
